1.11: KARST MORPHOLOGY AND MORPHOGENESIS: exokarst of carbonatic rocks (limestones, dolomites, chalk, marbles), geochemistry
1.12: HYDROLOGY: Water chemistry and physics, springs and sinks, karstic groundwater, water tracings, hydrogeology
1.13: GEOLOGY AND PEDOLOGY: petrography, tectonics, bauxite, glaciations
1.14: CLIMATOLOGY AND BIOLOGY OF KARST REGIONS
1.15: FOSSIL KARST: paleokarst, karstic fillings, paleogeography
1.21: MORPHOLOGY AND SPELEOGENESIS IN CARBONATIC ROCKS: caves, potholes, corrosion and erosion, small and large hollow forms, sumps
1.23: SUBTERRANEAN DEPOSITS AND FILLINGS: chemistry and mineralogy, sinter morphology, clay and alluvial sediments, collapses.
1.24: SUBTERRANEAN CLIMATOLOGY: temperature, hygrometry, winds, air-CO2, dripping and condensation waters, ice.
1.26: CHRONOLOGY OF SUBTERRANEAN FILLINGS: stratigraphy, datings, palynology, paleoenvironment
1.3: SPECIAL KARSTS: conglomerates, magnesite, travertine, tufa, calcarenite, corals, chalk, calcareous flysch
1.5: PARAKARST IN SILICEOUS ROCKS: quartzite, sandstones, flysch, loess, marles, piping in alluvial material
1.8: HYPO- AND PSEUDOKARST IN VOLCANIC ROCKS: lavas
4.10: ARCHAEOLOGY, PREHISTORICAL AND HISTORICAL CULTURES: GENERALITIES without regional connections
4.11: ARCHAEOLOGY, PREHISTORICAL AND HISTORICAL CULTURES: EUROPE
4.12: ARCHAEOLOGY, PREHISTORICAL AND HISTORICAL CULTURES: AMERICA
4.13: ARCHAEOLOGY, PREHISTORICAL AND HISTORICAL CULTURES: ASIA
4.14: ARCHAEOLOGY, PREHISTORICAL AND HISTORICAL CULTURES: AFRICA
4.15: ARCHAEOLOGY, PREHISTORICAL AND HISTORICAL CULTURES: AUSTRALASIA, OCEANIA
5.1: FOSSIL AND SUBFOSSIL FAUNAS AND FLORAS (QUATERNARY)
5.10: FOSSIL AND SUBFOSSIL FAUNAS AND FLORAS (QUATERNARY): GENERALITIES without regional connections
5.11: FOSSIL AND SUBFOSSIL FAUNAS AND FLORAS (QUATERNARY): EUROPE
5.12: FOSSIL AND SUBFOSSIL FAUNAS AND FLORAS (QUATERNARY): AMERICA
5.13: FOSSIL AND SUBFOSSIL FAUNAS AND FLORAS (QUATERNARY): ASIA
5.14: FOSSIL AND SUBFOSSIL FAUNAS AND FLORAS (QUATERNARY): AFRICA
5.15: FOSSIL AND SUBFOSSIL FAUNAS AND FLORAS (QUATERNARY)
5.2: FOSSIL AND SUBFOSSIL FAUNAS AND FLORAS (QUATERNARY): VARIA
6.1: ENVIRONMENT and HYGIENE: drinking waters, pollution, cleaning, geosystem.
6.2: MINES, ENGINEERING: use of artificial and natural cavities, poljes and hydraulic power, irrigations, Flood and collapse control, Urban and mine speleology
6.3: LAW, PROTECTION: legislation, protection, vandalism, access restrictions, Ownership
6.4: RECREATION, TOURISM, GEOSYSTEM: biogeography, planning, agriculture, demography, parks, show caves and management, anthropogenic impacts
6.7: VARIA: Collectables: philately, badges, postcards etc.
7.1: EXPLORATION TECHNIQUES AND MATERIALS: personal equipement
7.3: PROSPECTION: geophysical, chemical, mathematical methods, photogrammetry
7.4: ACCIDENTS AND RESCUE: techniques and material including dive accidents, accident reports and analysis, rescue exercises
7.6: EDUCATION: caving schools, training exercises, didactics, ethics, teaching, exhibitions
8.1: TOPOGRAPHY: methods and material for subterranean surveying and cartography, computer assisted mapping
8.2: TERMINOLOGY, TOPONYMY: glossaries, multilingual terminology list, naming practice
8.3: BIBLIOGRAPHY: general bibliographic documentation, indexes of periodcal libraries, catalogues, documentation by informatics, regional

The application is faster, and benefits: O aplicativo é mais rápido e tem a vantagem de um código de melhor qualidade, o que também é mais fácil de ser mantido: Especialistas em processamento de dados podem se juntar à equipe de desenvolvimento e facilmente contribuir.
The BBS (\"Bulletin Bibliographique Spél: The BBS ("Bulletin Bibliographique Spéléologique" in french) is an annual review of the worldwide speleological litterature.
The BBS is now directly integrated in Gr: The BBS is now directly integrated in Grottocenter and provides a summary of any document published on paper or online.
The documents entered via this form are: The documents entered via this form are compatible with the BBS. The BBS is now directly integrated in Grottocenter.

The international voluntary association: Quem opera a aplicação Web GrottoCenter é a associação internacional voluntária WikiCaves. WikiCaves tem como objetivos:
The library has been deduced from the pa: The library has been deduced from the parent document.
The library is the place where the docum: The library is the place where the document can be consulted. Choose an organization from those already registered at Grottocenter. If the organization you are looking for does not exist in Grottocenter, you can add it by using the “+” button on the right.
The library is where the document is phy: The library is where the document is physically stored.
The nickname defines how other users see: The nickname defines how other users see you.
The parent document is the document that: The parent document is the document that contains the document you are submitting (an article has a periodical issue as its parent document, a periodical issue has a periodical as its parent document).
The Wiki database made by cavers for cav: A base de dados Wiki feita por espeleólogos para espeleólogos.
The Wikicaves association has signed par: The Wikicaves association has signed partnership with clubs and federations which provide data and which are informed of all the actions carried out. Besides we  have routine programmes that  regularly  check the quality of the data.
There is no caves related to this group: There is no caves related to this group currently.
Therefore, for a few weeks, you will hav: Therefore, for a few weeks, you will have the opportunity to respond to our <fundRaisingOperationUrl>fund-raising operation</fundRaisingOperationUrl>.
This {0} version of the site is improvin: A versão {0} desta página está melhorando gradativamente para uma navegação mais simples a partir de todos os seus dispositivos.
This massif has no caves repertoried yet: This massif has no caves repertoried yet
This newer, faster and more up-to-date v: This newer, faster and more up-to-date version of the site also aims to provide you with new functions. Some are already up and running: a fast and efficient search module, suggestions for document analyzes to people connected to their account, etc.
This page documents the available API yo: This page documents the available API you can use on your website
This site, although it may contain detai: Esta página, mesmo que contenha informações detalhadas sobre cavernas, não foi feita para facilitar a visitação por pessoas sem treinamento adequado. Perigos não são necessariamente listados e as informações não foram verificadas para todos os casos. Espeleologia é uma disciplina com muitas vertentes: cultural, ciência, desporto, entre outros. No caso de desporto, bom preparo físico é sempre necessário. A atividade não é livre de pequenos riscos, nem grandes riscos. Estes riscos, caso impossível de serem eliminados completamente, podem no mínimo serem reduzidos ao seguir certas regras, uma prática completamente entendida entre os grupos (ou clubes) de espeleologia. Em caso algum GRORROCENTER e sua equipe podem ser responsabilizados por má prática da espeleologia. Iniciantes que pretendem adentrar cavernas são encorajados a contatar um grupo de espeleologia. Nomes e informações de contato podem ser obtidas com a IUS (União Internacional de Espeleologia), o GROTTOCENTER ou com a sua federação de nível nacional.
